Entries.reject_867: Oh, I'm sure George would've been interested in that. Perhaps Magnus would take it instead?
Entries.Tue: I'm hoping to find some leeks on my walk today. I want to make a nice soup to remember George by.$h
Entries.Fri: George always spent the whole day in front of that darned television set.#$e#I wish he would've gone outside more. There's so much he never got to see.$s
Entries.Tue6: It's nice of you to take the time to visit me.#$e#Without young people around, I'd age much faster.$h
Entries.summer_Tue: The summer was always George's favorite month... I think it may be mine, too. The warm weather softens you up, doesn't it?#$e#It's important to savor the weather before it passes.
Entries.fall_Tue: I've been putting raisins in Alex's oatmeal... I like to keep him nice and healthy so he do his very best at gridball.
Entries.winter_Sat8: @, have I told you that I've have lived in my old house for {{query: 30 + {{EYear}}}} years?#$e#I hope you stay here for a while.$h

Entries.reject_866: That's a very pretty rose, dear. It makes me think of Emily. Perhaps Magnus could have an honorable use for it?

Entries.2.000: When you get to be my age you have to come here more often.

Entries.winter_17.000: This is one of the newer traditions in Pelican Town... but I've taken to it rather quickly.
Entries.23.001: Could you just check right here? Pardon me, I worry a too much.
